body.name: HOMEIDEAS Black French Door Curtains, Privacy Small Door Window Curtains, 26 X 20 Inch French Door Shades for Front Door, Thermal Insulated Tie Up Shades Door Window Coverings for Bedroom, 1 Panel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🌸EASY HANGING: The package includes 1door curtain panel and 1 adhesive strip. It can be easily installed without any tools or curtain rods. Just follow our instruction picture to install, put the sticky strip on the glass, and joint together with the sticking place on door curtain panels firmly.

🌸ELEGANT CURTAINS: HOMEIDEAS' s door curtains are matches perfectly your french door. Door curtains are made of 230GSM (230 grams per square meter) with high-quality durable 100% polyester fabric, these blackout curtains are silky, soft, wrinkle resistant, thick, very pleasant to touch, and free from chemical smell, bring warmth to your home, enjoy the private time with your sweet family.

🌸BLACKOUT & PRIVACY: These soft and durable french door curtains are made of innovative triple weaving technology, which can ensure 85%-95% blackout ability, no worry about streetlights and porch lights, and protect furniture and rugs from fading by blocking UV rays, the color the darker the better, and provide enough privacy.

🌸MULTI-COLORS & SIZES: Many different colors and sizes for your choice. Meet various needs and purposes of different people. These blackout door curtains can blend in easily with your bedroom, living room, dining room, laundry room, kitchen, or any room in your home. please order more if you need more.

🌸EASY CARE: Machine Wash Cold, delicate cycle with mild detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble Dry Low. These door curtains aren't easy to fade. Cool the iron if necessary to remove potential wrinkles from the packaging.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Details of Door Curtains -REMOVABLE STICKY DESIGN The adhesive strip on top of the door shade is designed with a detachable sticky. Easy installation without any tool. -GREAT BLACKOUT PERFORMANCE The blackout effect depends on the darkness of colors. The color darker the better. Panels in darker colors can provide you with enough privacy. -TRIPLE WEAVE TECHNOLOGY Interwoven by a top solid fabric layer, high-density black yarn, and back solid fabric layer, it makes curtains have better shading ability. -EASY CARE Machine wash cold separately. Gentle cycle, do not bleach. Tumble dry low, Wash Below 30 °C. Cool iron if needed.

What if the strap falls within a month, can I ask for it? We will try our best to solve the problem, please leave us a message. Do I need to buy adhesive strip if I buy a door curtain? No, you don't need to buy the adhesive strip, it will come with the curtain to you. Can this door curtain block the sunlight？ It can block strong sunlight perfectly. The color darker the blackout effect is better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: This curtain suits my needs perfectly. I was seeking something for my kitchen door window that offered privacy at night yet could easily be adjusted for sunlight during the day. Installation needed to be hassle-free, without dealing with curtain rods or screws. This was the ideal fix. The velcro firmly adheres to the doorframe, and raising the curtain is a breeze. It's supported by two straps and is also equipped with velcro.When hanging this curtain, caution is advised. The adhesive is very sticky, so once it's in place, it stays put. If you initially apply it unevenly, readjusting might pose a challenge. The yellow shade is a tad darker than my usual preference, but surprisingly, it complements my kitchen decor well.I highly recommend these curtains to anyone in search of a quick, simple solution for window coverings. They offer the privacy needed at night while easily adjusted to allow daylight in during the day. However, ensure precision during installation due to the strong adhesive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend the French Privacy Door Curtains to anyone seeking a stylish and convenient solution.
reviews.reviewText: I recently added the French Privacy Door Curtains to my home, and I must say, they have exceeded my expectations in both functionality and aesthetics. The installation process was an absolute breeze, living up to the promise of easy installation. Within minutes, I transformed my door window into an elegant and private space. The curtains came with all the necessary hardware, and the clear instructions made the setup straightforward, even for someone with limited DIY experience. The convenience factor of these curtains cannot be overstated. The easy-to-slide design allows for quick adjustments, enabling me to control the level of privacy and natural light in the room effortlessly. The curtains also strike a perfect balance between providing privacy and allowing a soft, diffused light to filter through, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. Beyond their visual appeal, these curtains effectively fulfill their primary purpose—providing privacy. Whether I'm hosting guests or simply enjoying a quiet evening at home, the French Privacy Door Curtains have become an integral part of my living space.

reviews.reviewText: Loved the look/easy to install/inexpensive window dressing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and elegant
reviews.reviewText: I was easy to install and sleek look. The material is thick so black out is super nice. Easy to lift up as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blocks view inside
reviews.reviewText: The color is deep & rich. I got burnt orange. Width & length as stated. No pilling of material. Well made. Velcro extremily strong. This is the 3rd one of these types of door blinds i've bought. I have one more to get. I love that there's no drilling! Putting it up takes just seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect and so easy to put up!
reviews.reviewText: Title sums it up. It covers the window and provides a perfect shade since my laundry room is there as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Update: So happy with my first purchase, I ordered 2 more. This time I went with the Coffee color 30”by “68 for my double French doors. With winter approaching, and my recliner by the doors, it cuts down on the cold draft from the windows. I was concerned about the length, adhesive and cold weather considering they are metal doors, but like my previous order, they are holding up just fine. Previous order & comment: Better than expected and happy I ordered two sets. Material is soft and it blocks out the light. They also give you privacy. My previous curtains you could see through especially at night with the lights on. Easy to hang and roll back up. I’m tall, so that helps. The adhesive backing works great on both my metal and wood door. Very tacky velcro strip, so make sure you know where you are going to place them before removing the backing. There are also two small tabs that need to be removed on the inside velcro that keep the curtain straps in place once hung. I hung both of these curtains as soon as they arrived so as you can see, the material is a little wrinkled yet from the packaging. They should straighten out in a few days. Both my widows are 24” inches wide by 36” inches long. I ordered both curtains 26” inches wide by 40” inches long and they work great. Perfect size. Wish I would have seen these sooner. I had used nails in my wooden door to hang my previous curtain rods and magnetic rods on my metal door that always slid down and scratched my door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value, needs ironing to get pleated look.
reviews.reviewText: well we had to return 1 because it came with no adhesive strip and we couldn't get just the strip. We received the replacement 2 days later, quick response. The material is easy to work with, the directions are less than stellar. To get the pleated/feathered look along the edges as shown on the instructions you will need to do some fancy ironing, but functionally they work very well.
Love the color bought 2.Love the way it hangs on my door and mud room windowLove how easy it installed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to put up and really works!
reviews.reviewText: Love how easy this was to put up. It really darkens a room and works great! Does exactly what I wanted it to at a great price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad y facil de instalar
reviews.reviewText: Mi cuarto lo hicieron con ventanas largas y no tenia presupuesto para persianas, asi que use estas que eran para puertas, y 😳, funcionaron muy bien, el sol en las mañas ni lo siento ni se ve, mi cuarto es una cueva con ellas, me encantaron, solo hubiera preferido que fueran enrollables desde abajo y poder acomodar la altura a voluntad en lugar de siempre tener wue subirlas hasta arriba, pero al rato las corto y ya 😅
